physics3d
Class PlaneSegment

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--physics3d.PlaneSegment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Physics3dObject
public final class PlaneSegment
extends java.lang.Object
implements Physics3dObject

PlaneSegment is an immutable ADT which represents a plane in 3-space. The plane is defined by three non-collinear points and the normal is right-handed (p1->p2->p3, thumb points to normal) A PlaneSegment is only a part of a plane.
